text: <@U02RUK4S22W> In your `base.html` file are you pulling in the drag-n-drop css? I believe the files are called `layout.css` and `containers-dnd.css`, or something like that

<@U02MUL5L5N3> Yeah, that was it, Thanks so much! Seems to work fine now.

The new boilerplate has a `theme-overrides.css` (different than tutorials) and the `layout.css` and `containers-dnd.css` are in a css/objects folder. Indeed, I needed those. Cheers!
